segments.text: Excuse me , Mr . Li . I have something to discuss with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm in a bit of a hurry , Miss Liu . Can you wait for a minute ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would really appreciate it if we could talk for a few minutes now . It's about the overtime you've asked me to put in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really can't work overtime . Because my husband has been ill recently , I must take care of him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry to hear that . Take good care of your husband . I'll find another one to replace you .
segments.speaker: S2
